Uses of Interface
cern.colt.buffer.IntBuffer2DConsumer

Packages that use IntBuffer2DConsumer
cern.colt.buffer Fixed sized (non resizable) streaming buffers connected to a target objects to which data is automatically flushed upon buffer overflow. 
 

Uses of IntBuffer2DConsumer in cern.colt.buffer
 

Classes in cern.colt.buffer that implement IntBuffer2DConsumer
 class IntBuffer2D
          Fixed sized (non resizable) streaming buffer connected to a target IntBuffer2DConsumer to which data is automatically flushed upon buffer overflow.
 

Constructors in cern.colt.buffer with parameters of type IntBuffer2DConsumer
IntBuffer2D(IntBuffer2DConsumer target, int capacity)
          Constructs and returns a new buffer with the given target.
